item.title: Reasons why css sucks and not related to programming whatsoever

item.title: best languages
item.description: Best programming Languages Haskell Lisp Rust Others

item.title: best languages
item.description: These are tools used by me for productive boost Editor That part is easy, simply use vim for production boost. Other great editor is GNU/Emacs but it’s a GUI, you can use it inside terminal but that is not recommended. There is also neovim, it’s fork of vim and integrated with lua programming language. One can simply use a real programming language for configuring neovim. Hardest part when starting to use vim/neovim is keybindings.
